name: skill-generator-marketplace
description: A marketplace for codebase analysis and skill generation plugins

plugins.name: skill-generator
plugins.description: Analyzes codebase and generates specialized skills for security, performance, React, and backend technologies

generate-skills.description: Analyzes codebase and generates specialized skills using 10 sub-agents

tech-stack-analyzer.description: Analyzes the codebase to detect technologies and frameworks

security-analyzer.description: Analyzes codebase for security patterns and generates security skills

performance-analyzer.description: Analyzes codebase for performance patterns and generates performance skills

react-analyzer.description: Analyzes React code and generates React-specific skills

backend-analyzer.description: Analyzes backend code and generates backend-specific skills

frontend-analyzer.description: Analyzes frontend code and generates frontend-specific skills

database-analyzer.description: Analyzes database usage and generates database-specific skills

api-analyzer.description: Analyzes API patterns and generates API-specific skills

testing-analyzer.description: Analyzes testing patterns and generates testing-specific skills

devops-analyzer.description: Analyzes DevOps configuration and generates DevOps-specific skills
